citeinfo.title: DNR Division of Parks and Trails Area and District Boundaries

pubinfo.publish: Minnesota DNR - Division of Parks and Trails

descript.abstract: This metadata record describes two closely related datasets: DNR Division of Parks and Trails Area Boundaries and DNR Division of Parks and Trails District Boundaries. These datasets show the DNR Division of Parks and Trails Area and District Boundaries as of September 2010. The boundaries were created by the Division Leadership Team. Boundaries are congruent with the former Division of Trails and Waterways Area Boundaries.
descript.purpose: This data set was created to display and query Parks and Trails resources managed by department staff. It is useful for spatial analysis as well as cartographic applications.

timeperd.current: The boundaries in this data set were last updated in September of 2010 to reflect the relationship with District boundaries established in May of 2010. The Parks and Trails Area code in the ALTD_NAME field for one feature was updated and reflects current Area codes as of February 2011.

theme.themekey: Parks, Trails, Boundaries, Areas, Districts, Management, Administration, Integration

attracc.attraccr: The accuracy of these data is based on prior data that still holds true to this data set.

dataqual.logic: Data are topologically congruent to county boundaries and DNR Administrative Regions, and DNR Division of Parks and Trails Area Boundaries are topologically congruent to Division of Parks and Trails District Boundaries.

procstep.procdesc: These data were developed as a modification of the earlier Trails and Waterways Division Area boundary data. Some modifications occured in the spatial data and the table reflects these changes.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team

Field alias: Parks and Trails Area Name. Area Name or Code.
Field alias: Date Data Validated. Date of last data update.

Area of Area polygon in meters.
